thread.title: Video boss demands £30,000 unpaid fines from 20 YEARS ago | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Video boss demands £30,000 unpaid fines from 20 YEARS ago | Daily Mail Online

author: Rachael Burford For Mailonline
title: Video boss demands £30,000 unpaid fines from 20 YEARS ago | Daily Mail Online
text: Video shop boss writes to customers demanding £30,000 in unpaid fines dating back 20 YEARS Giles Hando is demanding that 900 former customers pay their historic debts His rental store Beltinge Video shut in November, owing almost £30,000 He had 228 unreturned videos and said this is 'final opportunity' to pay fines Jenna Meek owes £14 because she returned Ghost four days late in 2005 Have you had a demand from Beltinge Video? Email rachael.burford@mailonline.co.uk
